modelCreation.title: Create Your Virtual Model
modelCreation.subtitle: Select the criteria below to generate a model that best represents your target customer.
modelCreation.mainSubtitle: Generate hyper-realistic models, style them with your garments, and create stunning product imagery in minutes. The future of e-commerce is here.

step1.title: 1. Provide a Model
step1.description: Use our Smart Match by uploading a garment, or create a custom model from scratch with detailed criteria.

step2.title: 2. Style & Pose
step2.description: Upload your garment, choose from dozens of professional poses, and perfect the look.

step3.title: 3. Generate Image
step3.description: Our AI generates a high-resolution, photorealistic image ready for your e-commerce store or marketing campaign.

create.title: Create a Custom Model
create.subtitle: Fine-tune every detail to generate the perfect model.

smartMatch.mainSubtitle: Upload a garment photo and let AI generate a perfectly matched model.
smartMatch.title: Smart Match
smartMatch.subtitle: Have a garment? Upload it and we'll generate the perfect model for you instantly.
smartMatch.cta: Drag & drop or click to upload

myCollection.title: My Collection
myCollection.subtitle: Select a previously saved model to start a new session.
myCollection.empty: Your collection is empty. Generate and collect some models!

templates.title: Start from a Template
templates.subtitle: Select a saved template to quickly set up your scene.
templates.empty: You have no saved templates. Create some in the workspace!

workspace.title: Virtual Try-On
workspace.posedModelPlaceholder: Select a pose to generate the model.

upload.title: Upload Your Garment
upload.subtitle: Drag & drop a file or browse your computer
upload.successSubtitle: Ready for try-on. Upload another to replace.

garmentLibrary.title: Garment Library
garmentLibrary.empty: Your library is empty. Add a garment to get started.

segment.resegmentPrompt: Is the segmentation incorrect? Try again:

workspace.previewPlaceholder: Your final image will appear here.

sceneEditor.title: Scene Editor
sceneEditor.noProjects: You have no saved projects with a final image. Please create and save some projects first.
sceneEditor.noLayers: Add models from your projects to begin building a scene.

errors.generateModels: Failed to generate models. Please try again.
errors.virtualTryOn: Virtual try-on failed. Please try again with a different image.
errors.segmentGarment: Failed to segment garment. Please try a clearer image.
errors.resegmentGarment: Failed to re-segment garment. Please try again.
errors.refineGarment: Failed to refine segmentation. Please try again.
errors.changeBackground: Failed to change background. Please try again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: You've sent too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.smartMatchFailed: Smart match failed. Please try again or create a model manually.
errors.analyzeGarment: Failed to analyze garment style. Please try again.
errors.safetyBlock: Generation failed due to safety policies. Please try adjusting your description or settings.
errors.inpaintFailed: Partial redraw failed. Please try again.
errors.upscaleFailed: HD processing failed. Please try again.
errors.refineModelFailed: Model refinement failed. Please try again.
errors.segmentPersonFailed: Failed to segment person from image.
errors.harmonizeSceneFailed: Failed to harmonize the scene. Please try again.

swapModelModal.title: Swap Model
swapModelModal.selectMethod: How would you like to swap the model?
swapModelModal.randomSubtitle: Generating 4 random models for you to choose from.
swapModelModal.customSubtitle: Define the exact criteria for the new model.
swapModelModal.selectOne: Select one to apply to your image.

changeBackgroundModal.customPlaceholder: e.g., a futuristic cityscape at dusk

batchProcessingModal.title: Batch Generation
batchProcessingModal.noModels: No models in your collection to select from.

inpaintingModal.title: Magic Fix (Inpainting)
inpaintingModal.instruction: Use the brush to mask the area you want to change, then describe what you'd like to see.

refineModelModal.title: Refine Model
refineModelModal.instruction: Use the brush to mask an area of the model (e.g., hair, face) and describe your desired change.
refineModelModal.promptPlaceholder: e.g., more natural smile, add volume to hair

myProjectsModal.namePrompt: Enter a name for your project:
myProjectsModal.shareDescription: Anyone with this link can view and comment on the project.

myTemplatesModal.namePrompt: Enter a name for your template:

shareView.notFound: Project not found or has been deleted.

toasts.modelRefined: Model updated. Poses will be re-generated upon selection.
toasts.autoLogin: Logged in as Guest to save your project.

onboarding.welcomeText: This quick guide will walk you through the main steps to create your first virtual try-on image.
onboarding.step1Text: Start by choosing a pose for your model from the library on the left. This will be the base for your final image.
onboarding.step2Text: Next, add a garment to your library. You can upload images of your own clothes here.
onboarding.step3Text: Once you have a model in a pose and a garment selected, click here to let the AI perform the virtual try-on.
onboarding.step4Text: Your final image appears in the preview panel. From here, you can use the editing tools or download your creation.
onboarding.finishText: That's the basic workflow! Feel free to explore other powerful features like swapping models, changing backgrounds, and batch generation.
